page.title: 07ECOLOGY
page.content:
{River:}The Irthing flows west to join the River Eden,eventually reaching the Solway Firth.The river bed runs in sills,housing brown and rainbow trout and eels.Salmon run the river to spawn.Fishing is private.
{Geology:}The rock strata in the Irthing Gorge composes of sandstone , bituminous shale,aluminous schist,porphyritic slate embedded with crystals of feldspar and iron pyrites.
{Sulphur spring:}Situated in the Spa woods,the chemical analysis of the water can be found on page 13 .
{Climate:}The prevailing wind is west and the rainfall high.
/ / /{over}]
